extensionName.message: words.video | make words to video | playphrase.me

extensionDescription.message: Create word learning videos from webpage content. Extract video clips and generate educational materials.

exportMP4Tooltip.message: Compose material clips into MP4 video

exportZIPTooltip.message: Package all individual video materials into ZIP archive

frozenSubtitleTooltip.message: Already frozen, subtitles will no longer update

exportComplete.message: Video export completed! File downloaded automatically.

addClipsFirst.message: Please add video clips to timeline first

audioSuspended.message: \nNote: Audio context suspended, will auto-activate during export

dragToResize.message: Drag to resize upper and lower sections

noClipsProcessed.message: No video clips were successfully processed
